Class ApplicationService

java.lang.Object
ApplicationService
public class ApplicationService extends Object
Service class for managing internship applications. Handles application submission, approval, rejection, and withdrawal processes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Constructs an ApplicationService with the necessary repositories.

      opportunityId - the ID of the internship opportunity
      Returns:
      true if application was successful, false otherwise
